dailyRoutine.task: Watch 1-hour video tutorial on the fundamentals of [field of study]
Complete 10 practice exercises related to the video content
Review and revise concepts from the day's learning
Watch 2-hour video tutorial on advanced concepts in [field of study]
Complete 20 practice exercises and projects related to the video content
Engage in online forums or communities to discuss concepts and seek clarification
Work on a real-world project applying learned concepts
Analyze and critique existing projects or solutions in [field of study]
Contribute to open-source projects or participate in online challenges
